title: "Error processing message"
body: So pretty much everyime i talk to someone or create a lobby LOL comes up with this error and it tells me to restart LOL, which ive done a few times to no avail. Any assistance you can provide would be much appreciated. Thanks.

replies.body:
Same.

On a side note. FIX ILLAOI

Hey there,

This is more than likely a result of the disabling of club tags, as seen in [this thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/ih5gWw8j-56-club-tag-creation-disabled-and-server-error-message-in-client).

>In an effort to resolve this, we disabled the ability to create club tags, but this also caused an obscure error message to start popping up for all players talking about a processing error from the server. This error message actually doesn't actually affect anything, but is incredibly flippin' annoying.

We are working on getting a hotfix out in the near future to get this to stop appearing, but don't have an ETA just yet. We'll let everyone know if anything changes!
